name: ManiaTrucks
description:
ManiaTrucks is an economic arcade driving game. You play as a cargo driver, where your goal is delivering freight to the industries in need. However, time and efficiency is key, and bringing your best out each day is what you’re aiming for. Once the timer runs out, the manufacturers’ interests will fade out. Will you be able to bring competence around the world?

TRAINING MODE:

Learn the Ins and Outs of ManiaTrucks!

ARCADE MODE:

Beat levels by delivering cargo round after round, while also racing a timer! Earn money with deliveries, upgrade and maintain your truck, and become the fastest truck driver out there!

REWARDS:

Earn trophies, reward vehicles, and even cheat codes to further enhance your experience!

HIGHSCORES:

All scores are kept at the end of each playthrough. Get rich and climb to the top!
